events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I want to return it and get a refund.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the received product.
Assigning a customer service agent to handle the refund request and assist the customer further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can expedite your refund?
Sure, my order number is 548392, and the product does not match the description on your website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the return process immediately and issue your refund once we receive the item back.
That sounds good to me, I appreciate your quick response and help with this matter.
Your refund request has been processed. Please send the item back within 10 days to complete the return.
We wanted to check if you have sent back the product and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday and received a confirmation from the courier. Thanks for following up!
The return has been completed and your refund processed successfully. We are closing this case now.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
